00001 #! /usr/bin/env python
00002 ##

00011 ## detect win32 specific settings 
00012 def detect(env):
00013         import os, sys
00014         import SCons.Util
00015         env['GENCXXFLAGS'] = []
00016         env['CPPPATH'] = []
00017 
00018         # (rh) The flags from GENCCFLAGS seems to be added to GENCXXFLAGS, 
00019         # so there is no need to duplicate settings in GENCXXGLAGS
00020         if env['ARGS'].has_key('debug'):
00021                 env['BKS_DEBUG'] = env['ARGS'].get('debug')
00022                 env.pprint('CYAN','** Enabling debug for the project **')
00023                 if env['CC'] == 'gcc':
00024                         env['GENCCFLAGS'] = ['-g']
00025                         env['GENLINKFLAGS'] = ['-g']
00026                 elif env['CC'] == 'cl':
00027                         env['GENCCFLAGS'] = ['-Od','-ZI','-MDd']
00028                         env['GENLINKFLAGS'] = ['/INCREMENTAL', '/DEBUG']
00029         else:
00030                 if env['CC'] == 'gcc':
00031                         env['GENCCFLAGS'] = ['-O2', '-DNDEBUG', '-DNO_DEBUG']
00032                         env['GENLINKFLAGS'] = []
00033                 elif env['CC'] == 'cl':
00034                         env['GENCCFLAGS'] = ['-MD']
00035                         env['GENLINKFLAGS'] = ['']
00036 
00037         if env['CC'] == 'cl':
00038                 # avoid some compiler warnings...
00039                 env.AppendUnique( GENCCFLAGS = ['-wd4619','-wd4820'] )
00040         
00041         if os.environ.has_key('CXXFLAGS'):  env['GENCXXFLAGS']  += SCons.Util.CLVar( os.environ['CXXFLAGS'] )
00042         if os.environ.has_key('CFLAGS'): env['GENCCFLAGS'] = SCons.Util.CLVar( os.environ['CFLAGS'] )
00043         if os.environ.has_key('LINKFLAGS'): env['GENLINKFLAGS'] += SCons.Util.CLVar( os.environ['LINKFLAGS'] )
00044         # for make compatibility 
00045         if os.environ.has_key('LDFLAGS'):   env['GENLINKFLAGS'] += SCons.Util.CLVar( os.environ['LDFLAGS'] )
00046 
00047         # User-specified prefix
00048         if env['ARGS'].has_key('prefix'):
00049                 env['PREFIX'] = os.path.abspath( env['ARGS'].get('prefix', '') )
00050                 env.pprint('CYAN','** installation prefix for the project set to:',env['PREFIX'])
00051 
00052         # User-specified include paths
00053         if env['ARGS'].has_key('extraincludes'):
00054                 env['EXTRAINCLUDES'] = env['ARGS'].get('extraincludes','').split(':')
00055                 env.pprint('CYAN','** extra include paths for the project set to:',env['EXTRAINCLUDES'])
00056 
00057         # User-specified library search paths
00058         if env['ARGS'].has_key('extralibs'):
00059                 env['EXTRALIBS'] = env['ARGS'].get('extralibs','').split(':')
00060                 env.pprint('CYAN','** extra library search paths for the project set to:',env['EXTRALIBS'])
00061 
00062         # no colors if user does not want them
00063         if os.environ.has_key('NOCOLORS'): env['NOCOLORS']=1
00064 
00065         if env['CC'] == 'cl':
00066                 env.AppendUnique(CPPPATH = [os.environ['INCLUDE'].split()])
00067                 env['GENCCFLAGS']   += ['/Iwin\\include','/Iwin\\include\\msvc']
00068 # TODO (rh) don't know required cl flags, don't know how to set not in win dir 
00069 #               env['GENLINKFLAGS'] += ['']
00070 
00071         elif sys.platform == 'cygwin':
00072                 env['GENCCFLAGS']   += ['-mno-cygwin','-Iwin/include','-Iwin/include/mingw']
00073                 env['GENLINKFLAGS'] += ['-mno-cygwin','-L'+env['_BUILDDIR_']+'\\win']
00074                 # TODO (rh) move to win32 qt4 stuff 
00075                 qtmingwflags = '-DUNICODE -DQT_LARGEFILE_SUPPORT -DQT_EDITION=QT_EDITION_DESKTOP -DQT_DLL -DQT_NO_DEBUG -DQT_CORE_LIB -DQT_GUI_LIB -DQT_THREAD_SUPPORT' + ' -I' + os.environ['QTDIR'] + '/include'
00076                 env['GENCXXFLAGS']  += qtmingwflags.split()
00077 
00078                 # required libraries should be installed under mingw installation root, so add the search pathes 
00079                 if os.environ.has_key('MINGW'):  
00080                         env.pprint('CYAN','Checking for mingw installation: ok ',os.environ['MINGW'])
00081 #                       env['GENCXXFLAGS']  += ['-I' + os.environ['MINGW'] + '/include']
00082                         env['GENCCFLAGS']   += ['-I' + os.environ['MINGW'] + '/include']
00083                         env['GENLINKFLAGS'] += ['-Wl,--enable-runtime-pseudo-reloc','-Wl,--export-all-symbols','-L' + os.environ['MINGW'] + '/lib']
00084         elif os.environ.has_key('MINGW'):  
00085                 env.pprint('CYAN','Checking for mingw installation: ok ',os.environ['MINGW'])
00086                 env['GENCCFLAGS']   += ['-Iwin\\include','-Iwin\\include\\mingw']
00087                 env['GENLINKFLAGS'] += ['-L'+env['_BUILDDIR_']+'\\win']
00088 
00089                 # required libraries should be installed under mingw installation root, so add the search pathes 
00090                 env['GENCCFLAGS']   += ['-I' + os.environ['MINGW'] + '\\include']
00091                 env['GENLINKFLAGS'] += ['-Wl,--enable-runtime-pseudo-reloc','-Wl,--export-all-symbols','-Wl,--script,bksys\\win32\\i386pe.x-no-rdata','-L' + os.environ['MINGW'] + '\\lib']
00092 
00093                 qtmingwflags = '-DUNICODE -DQT_LARGEFILE_SUPPORT -DQT_EDITION=QT_EDITION_DESKTOP -DQT_DLL -DQT_NO_DEBUG -DQT_CORE_LIB -DQT_GUI_LIB -DQT_THREAD_SUPPORT' + ' -I' + os.environ['QTDIR'] + '\\include'
00094                 env['GENCXXFLAGS']  += qtmingwflags.split()
00095         
00096 ## create source package
00097 def dist(env):
00098         if not version: VERSION=os.popen("cat VERSION").read().rstrip()
00099         else: VERSION=version
00100         FOLDER  = appname+'-'+VERSION
00101         TMPFOLD = ".tmp"+FOLDER
00102         ARCHIVE = FOLDER+'.tar.bz2'
00103 
00104         # check if the temporary directory already exists
00105         os.popen('rm -rf %s %s %s' % (FOLDER, TMPFOLD, ARCHIVE) )
00106 
00107         # create a temporary directory
00108         startdir = os.getcwd()
00109 
00110         os.popen("mkdir -p "+TMPFOLD)   
00111         os.popen("cp -R * "+TMPFOLD)
00112         os.popen("mv "+TMPFOLD+" "+FOLDER)
00113 
00114         # remove scons-local if it is unpacked
00115         os.popen("rm -rf %s/scons %s/sconsign %s/scons-local-0.96.1" % (FOLDER, FOLDER, FOLDER))
00116 
00117         # remove our object files first
00118         os.popen("find %s -name \"cache\" | xargs rm -rf" % FOLDER)
00119         os.popen("find %s -name \"build\" | xargs rm -rf" % FOLDER)
00120         os.popen("find %s -name \"*.pyc\" | xargs rm -f " % FOLDER)
00121 
00122         # CVS cleanup
00123         os.popen("find %s -name \"CVS\" | xargs rm -rf" % FOLDER)
00124         os.popen("find %s -name \".cvsignore\" | xargs rm -rf" % FOLDER)
00125 
00126         # Subversion cleanup
00127         os.popen("find %s -name .svn -type d | xargs rm -rf" % FOLDER)
00128 
00129         # GNU Arch cleanup
00130         os.popen("find %s -name \"{arch}\" | xargs rm -rf" % FOLDER)
00131         os.popen("find %s -name \".arch-i*\" | xargs rm -rf" % FOLDER)
00132 
00133         # Create the tarball (coloured output)
00134         env.pprint('GREEN', 'Writing archive '+ARCHIVE)
00135         os.popen("tar cjf %s %s " % (ARCHIVE, FOLDER))
00136 
00137         # Remove the temporary directory
00138         os.popen('rm -rf '+FOLDER)
00139         env.Exit(0)
00140 
00141 ## Remove the cache directory
00142 def distclean(env):
00143         import os, shutil
00144         if os.path.isdir(env['CACHEDIR']): shutil.rmtree(env['CACHEDIR'])
00145         os.popen("find . -name \"*.pyc\" | xargs rm -rf")
00146         env.Exit(0)

00148 ## Function for building shared libraries
00149 def bksys_shlib(lenv, ntarget, source, libdir, libprefix='lib', vnum='', noinst=None):
00150         """Installs a shared library, with or without a version number  
00151         note: on win32 platforms only the major version number is used 
00152         """
00153         import types,os,sys
00154         # parameter can be a list
00155         if type(ntarget) is types.ListType: target=ntarget[0]
00156         else: target=ntarget
00157 
00158         thisenv = lenv.Copy() # copying an existing environment is +/- cheap
00159         thisenv['BKSYS_DESTDIR']=libdir
00160         thisenv['BKSYS_VNUM']=vnum
00161         thisenv['SHLIBPREFIX']=libprefix
00162 
00163         if len(vnum)>0:
00164                 if thisenv['CC'] == 'gcc':
00165                         num=vnum.split('.')[0]
00166                         thisenv['SHLIBSUFFIX']='-'+num+'.dll'
00167         
00168         lst=target.split(os.sep)
00169         tname=lst[len(lst)-1]
00170         libname=tname.split('.')[0]
00171 #       if thisenv['CC'] == 'gcc':
00172 #               thisenv.AppendUnique(LINKFLAGS = ["-Wl,--out-implib=%s.a" % (lenv.join(thisenv['CURBUILDDIR'],libname))] )
00173 
00174         # Fix against a scons bug - shared libs and ordinal out of range(128)
00175         # (rh) Is this really required ? 
00176         if type(source) is types.ListType:
00177                 src2=[]
00178                 for i in source: src2.append( str(i) )
00179                 source=src2
00180 
00181         library_list = thisenv.SharedLibrary(target, source)
00182         lafile_list  = thisenv.LaFile(libprefix+target, library_list)
00183 
00184         # Install the libraries automatically
00185         if not thisenv.has_key('NOAUTOINSTALL') and not noinst and libdir:
00186                 inst_lib=thisenv.bksys_install(libdir, library_list)
00187                 thisenv.bksys_install(libdir, lafile_list)      
00188 
00189         return library_list
00190 
00191 ## create .la file used by libtool
00192 def build_la_file(target, source, env):
00193         """ Writes a .la file, used by libtool """
00194         dest=open(target[0].path, 'w')
00195         sname=source[0].name
00196         dest.write("# Generated by ltmain.sh - GNU libtool 1.5.18 - (pwn3d by bksys)\n#\n#\n")
00197         if len(env['BKSYS_VNUM'])>0:
00198                 vnum=env['BKSYS_VNUM']
00199                 nums=vnum.split('.')
00200                 src=source[0].name
00201                 name = src.split('-')[0] + '.a'
00202                 dest.write("dlname='%s'\n" % (sname) )
00203                 dest.write("library_names='%s %s'\n" % (sname,name) )
00204         else:
00205                 dest.write("dlname='%s'\n" % sname)
00206                 src=source[0].name
00207                 name = src.split('.')[0] + '.a'
00208                 dest.write("library_names='%s %s'\n" % (sname, name) )
00209         dest.write("old_library=''\ndependency_libs=''\ncurrent=0\n")
00210         dest.write("age=0\nrevision=0\ninstalled=yes\nshouldnotlink=no\n")
00211         dest.write("dlopen=''\ndlpreopen=''\n")
00212         dest.write("libdir='%s'" % env['BKSYS_DESTDIR'])
00213         dest.close()
00214         #return 0
